1.content: Who will be the new skin of Ash?
1.title: Ash's new skin

choices: Go find someone else to zap
13.content: One day Ash and Dawn were walking down the road when a strange cubed like device with a metal rod sticking out of one side falls from the sky. Curious Dawn picks it up and investigates it. She then finds a button and out of curiosity presses it. A strange blue laser beam comes out of the metal rod of the device which happened to be pointing at Dawn zaps her. Ash then watches in horror as Dawn deflates slowly into a pile of skin. Horrified he sent Pikachu to get help as he picks her up, but the moment he touches her he gets a sudden urge to wear her. To satisfy this newfound urge he then looks for an opening in the back and then proceeds to put his legs in. Surprisingly, Dawn's skin stretches so his legs fit inside. Next he sticks his arms and torso in and finally he sticks his head in. The moment Ash fully puts on the skinsuit up he feels the skinsuit tighten and shrink his body to fit inside, Next Ash feels his chest inflate making A-Cup breasts. Next Ash feels a sucking feeling from his crotch as he watches as his penis gets sucked in transforming into a vagina then he feels a tingling sensation on his back, he then reaches for his back only to discover that the slit has sealed him inside. He then puts on Dawn's bra and panties and black socks, her pink and black dress, her red scarf and pink boots, and finally her white beanie. After all that Ash then ponders what to do.
13.title: Dawn

choices: Wait's for James and Meowth to return.
Decided to play a prank on his freinds.
152.content:
Jessie was pacing around in the forest around waiting for james and meowth to return so that their plan to capture pokemon especially Ash's pikachu could be implemented.
'How will I catch that twerp's pikachu??!!!' Jessie growled internally gritting her teeth.'Maybe I should......' were her last thoughts before being shot by a green light and deflating into a empty skin collasping on the ground.Ash clad in boxer's only came out of his hiding spot from bushes holding a platic toy gun in his right with smoke flowing out of the barrel.
Unwilling to waste anymore time he grabbed the pile of skin holding the head.''Finally I can be you.'' Ash said with a happy grin.Opening the seam in her back wider he wiggled his feet inside jessie's leg's.Continuing he slided his arms into the empty skin gloves and reaching the last step he started to tug the mask on to his head.Finished he took the toy gun reversing the dial and shooting himself with a red laser causing the skin to tighten and Ash could feel himself getting taller as well as certain assets forming.In a few minutes Ash had completely turned into Jessie.''Now thats over with, i can finally start to foil every single plan Team Rocket has plotted without them knowing and best of all i get to be Jessie every time!!.'' Ash said enthusiasticly smiling with Jessie's face.Then he......
152.title: Jessie

1521.title: Wait's for James and Meowth to return.

choices: Mess around with his rival Gary
Pretend to be your mother the whole day.
153.content:
In the early morning hours, Delia ketchum was busy cleaning the dishes as well as humming a short but pleasant tune.
'I wonder what Ash will want for breakfast?' Delia thought to herself thinking about her son who still asleep.
So distracted with her thoughts she didn't notice a mysterious shadow creeping up behind her until they raised with appreared to be a children's toy gun pointing right at her.
Without any warning a beam of green light emitted from the gun which hit Mrs ketchum envoloping her entire body in a greenish aura.In a matter of seconds poor Delia was deflated into a empty shell slumping over the kitchen table while the unknown culprit silently watching was filled with glee knowing that the gun worked.
As the figure stepped forward, it was shown to be Ash with a happy grin.Pulling her skin up by her neck while her arms and legs dangled uselessly.''Wow it really worked, mom's a costume now!!!.'' Ash said staring at Delia's face with nothing but empty eyeholes and a oval mouth.''Now i get to be mom for a whole day and no one would know!!.'' Ash said again smilling as he flipped her skin backwards and streching the slit like taffy.
Inserting his feet inside her empty legs he could feel his entire lower body expanding and changing to match hers.
Wanting to finish it quickly Ash quickly put his arms inside his mother's empty one's as well pulling up her chest causing them to swell into two orb's of flesh which squished into his hands causing a jolt of a unknown feeling to pass through him.''Well mom, here goes nothing.'' Ash spoke finally pulling Delia's head up, streching her face across until releasing letting out a huge SNAP!!!!.Pulling and squeezing Delia's face onto his.
In a few minutes Ash stood infront of a mirror feeling amazed at the fact that he has changed completely into his mother now while messing around with her body and pulling multiple expressions.Letting a smug grin and a slow laugh 'Delia' decided to........
153.title: Delia

154.title: Officer Jenny

choices: Team Rocket takes 'Jenny' to their base
1542.content:
It didn't take Ash that long to put out the suit on.
Once he had gotten it on, he let out a cough.
"Perfect." he whispered and noticed his voice sounded like one of the Jenny's. She then took a cautious step forward, only to get caught in a pit trap. "Crap."
1542.title: Trapped

info.brief_description: Ash finds a device. The device can turn female into skinsuit and Ash wears them.
info.description:
It's a story inspired by http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1938560-Skinned-in-Sonic of Swa59 and http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1678128-Naruto-Inflation-Suit-Adven... of Ëtalfni. Ash finds a device that can turn female into skinsuit!

It can use only on female
Only Ash and his female friends use the device.

No kill!
Misty is Ash's girlfriend.
info.pretty_title: Ash Ketchum and the skinsuit device
